item.description:
Celebrate your independence

Independence beyond the political….

When did you become independent or at least declare your independence? What event marked the moment? What food marked the moment?

Getting a driver’s license?
Going to college?
Paying for college?
The first apartment?
Running away from home?
Wealth?
First step?
Leaving the corporate cog position to gear up on your own?
Toilet training (yours or someone else’s)?
Divorce?
That cross country trip?
Hitchhiking in Europe?
Radioactive spider bite?
Breakthrough in the therapist’s office?
Finally off the crutches?
The first paycheck?
First legal glass of beer or wine?
A quiet moment alone?
That monkey finally off your back?
Graduation day?
Removing the training wheels?
Safely crossing the Rio Grande?

Maybe your independence is tied to a country, such as the USofA?

Figure it out…bring a food that means independence for you… we will be celebrating all forms of independence together so we are dependent on you joining us for the fun!

Remember, this is about your creativity and personal interpretation.
Plan to cook onsite unless your recipe takes more than an hour to prepare. The fun is in the cooking here all together.

Weather permitting we may be out side in July, bring a lawn chair!
item.how_to_find_us: my home so you will notice me and the dogs, will send address a few days before
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes July Meetup
